dashboard.footer: Your health matters to us. This app is built for convenience.

hero.title: Get AI-Powered Medical Help
hero.subtitle: Anytime. Anywhere.
hero.description: {{agentName}} is your personal AI doctor. Chat instantly about symptoms, get medical guidance, and organize your health records securely.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for your health
features.description: Accessible, reliable, and tailored to your needs AI-powered medical assistance.

chat.title: Chat with an AI Doctor
chat.description: Describe your symptoms and get AI-generated guidance instantly — 24/7. No waiting rooms, no appointments needed.

upload.title: Upload Medical Files
upload.description: Analyze lab results, images, and medical history with AI assistance. Get explanations and insights in plain language.

track.title: Track Appointments
track.description: Organize your health journey with history, summaries, and AI notes. Access your previous consultations anytime.

testimonial1.quote: {{agentName}} helped me understand my lab results when I couldn't get an appointment with my doctor. Explained everything in simple terms.
testimonial1.author: Sarah K.

testimonial2.quote: As someone living in a rural area, having 24/7 medical guidance has changed my life. It's like having a doctor in your pocket.
testimonial2.author: Michael T.

testimonial3.quote: The symptom checker is surprisingly accurate. Helped me identify a condition my regular doctor had been missing for months.
testimonial3.author: Jessica W.

cta.title: Ready to take control of
cta.subtitle: your health?
cta.description: Start with {{agentName}} today and experience the future of healthcare. No subscription required.

footer.security: HIPAA compliant. Private. Your data is yours.
